style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: "Arial",sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 180%; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 宋体'>1</SPAN><SPAN

lang=EN-US 
style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: "Arial",sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 180%; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 宋体'>2</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LINE-HEIGHT: 180%; mso-ascii-font-family: Arial; mso-hansi-font-family: Arial; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial">的要求编制财务报表；已执行新金融准则但未执行新收入准则和新租赁准则的企业，或已执行新金融准则和新收入准则但未执行新租赁准则的企业，应当结合本通知附件</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US 
style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: "Arial",sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 180%; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 宋体'>1</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LINE-HEIGHT: 180%; mso-ascii-font-family: Arial; mso-hansi-font-family: Arial; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial">和附件</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US 
style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: "Arial",sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 180%; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 宋体'>2</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LINE-HEIGHT: 180%; mso-ascii-font-family: Arial; mso-hansi-font-family: Arial; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial">的要求对财务报表项目进行相应调整。企业对不存在相应业务的报表项目可结合本企业的实际情况进行必要删减，企业根据重要性原则并结合本企业的实际情况可以对确需单独列示的内容增加报表项目。执行企业会计准则的金融企业应当按照《财政部关于修订印发</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US 
style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: "Arial",sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 180%; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 宋体'>2018</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LINE-HEIGHT: 180%; mso-ascii-font-family: Arial; mso-hansi-font-family: Arial; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial">年度金融企业财务报表格式的通知》（财会〔</SPAN><SPAN

lang=EN-US

</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-ascii-font-family: Arial; mso-hansi-font-family: Arial; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial">规定，企业变更会计政策或发生重要的前期差错更正，采用追溯</SPAN><SPAN 
style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: "Arial",sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 宋体'> 
</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-ascii-font-family: Arial; mso-hansi-font-family: Arial; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial">调整法的，应当对可比会计期间的比较数据进行相应调整。企业</SPAN><SPAN 
style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: "Arial",sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 宋体'> 
</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-ascii-font-family: Arial; mso-hansi-font-family: Arial; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial">首次执行新金融准则、新收入准则或新租赁准则，按照衔接规定，</SPAN><SPAN 
style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: "Arial",sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 宋体'> 
</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-ascii-font-family: Arial; mso-hansi-font-family: Arial; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial">对因会计政策变更产生的累积影响数调整首次执行当年年初留</SPAN><SPAN 
style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: "Arial",sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 宋体'> 
</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-ascii-font-family: Arial; mso-hansi-font-family: Arial; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial">存收益及财务报表其他相关项目金额，不调整可比期间信息的，</SPAN><SPAN 
style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: "Arial",sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 宋体'> 
</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-ascii-font-family: Arial; mso-hansi-font-family: Arial; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial">应当对首次执行当期的财务报表的本期数或期末数按照本附件</SPAN><SPAN 
style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: "Arial",sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 宋体'> 
</SPAN><SPAN

lang=EN-US 
style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: "Arial",sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 宋体'> 
1 </SPAN><SPAN

lang=EN-US 
style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: "Arial",sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 宋体'><o:p></o:p></SPAN></P>

</SPAN><SPAN

style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: "Arial",sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 宋体'> 
</SPAN><SPAN

style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: "Arial",sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 宋体'> 
</SPAN><SPAN

style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: "Arial",sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 宋体'> 
</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-ascii-font-family: Arial; mso-hansi-font-family: Arial; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial">分别披露首次执行各项新准则对当年年初财务报表相关项目的</SPAN><SPAN 
style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: "Arial",sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 宋体'> 
</SPAN><SPAN

lang=EN-US 
style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: "Arial",sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 宋体'><o:p></o:p></SPAN></P></DIV>

<P class=MsoBodyText

style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: "Arial",sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 宋体'><o:p></o:p></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoBodyText 
style="MARGIN: 0cm 25.65pt 6pt 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%"><SPAN lang=EN-US 
style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: "Arial",sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 宋体'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoBodyText 
style="MARGIN: 0cm 25.65pt 6pt 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%"><SPAN lang=EN-US 
style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: "Arial",sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 宋体'>1</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-ascii-font-family: Arial; mso-hansi-font-family: Arial; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial">．</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US 
style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: "Arial",sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 宋体'>“</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-ascii-font-family: Arial; mso-hansi-font-family: Arial; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial">交易性金融资产</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US 
style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: "Arial",sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 宋体'>”</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-ascii-font-family: Arial; mso-hansi-font-family: Arial; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial">项目，反映资产负债表日企业分类为</SPAN><SPAN 
style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: "Arial",sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 宋体'> 
</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-ascii-font-family: Arial; mso-hansi-font-family: Arial; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial">以公允价值计量且其变动计入当期损益的金融资产，以及企业持</SPAN><SPAN 
style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: "Arial",sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 宋体'> 
</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-ascii-font-family: Arial; mso-hansi-font-family: Arial; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial">有的指定为以公允价值计量且其变动计入当期损益的金融资产</SPAN><SPAN 
style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: "Arial",sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 宋体'> 
</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-ascii-font-family: Arial; mso-hansi-font-family: Arial; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial">的期末账面价值。该项目应根据</SPAN><SPAN

<P class=MsoBodyText 
style="MARGIN: 1.25pt -0.05pt 6pt 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; TEXT-INDENT: 28.2pt"><SPAN 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-ascii-font-family: Arial; mso-hansi-font-family: Arial; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial">有关项目说明：</SPAN><SPAN

style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: "Arial",sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 宋体'><o:p></o:p></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoBodyText 
style="MARGIN: 1.25pt -0.05pt 6pt 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; TEXT-INDENT: 28.2pt"><SPAN

style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: "Arial",sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 宋体'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoBodyText 
style="MARGIN: 1.25pt -0.05pt 6pt 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; TEXT-INDENT: 28.2pt"><SPAN 
lang=EN-US 
style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: "Arial",sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 宋体'>1</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-ascii-font-family: Arial; mso-hansi-font-family: Arial; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial">．</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US 
style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: "Arial",sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 宋体'>“</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-ascii-font-family: Arial; mso-hansi-font-family: Arial; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial">其他权益工具持有者投入资本</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US 
style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: "Arial",sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 宋体'>”</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-ascii-font-family: Arial; mso-hansi-font-family: Arial; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial">项目，反映企业发行的除</SPAN><SPAN 
style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: "Arial",sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 宋体'> 
</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-ascii-font-family: Arial; mso-hansi-font-family: Arial; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial">普通股以外分类为权益工具的金融工具的持有者投入资本的金额。</SPAN><SPAN 
style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: "Arial",sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 宋体'> 
</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-ascii-font-family: Arial; mso-hansi-font-family: Arial; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial">该项目应根据金融工具类科目的相关明细科目的发生额分析填列。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US 
style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: "Arial",sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 宋体'><o:p></o:p></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoBodyText 
style="MARGIN: 1.25pt -0.05pt 6pt 0cm; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; TEXT-INDENT: 28.2pt"><SPAN 
lang=EN-US 
style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: "Arial",sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 宋体'>2</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-ascii-font-family: Arial; mso-hansi-font-family: Arial; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial">．</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US 
style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: "Arial",sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 宋体'>“</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-ascii-font-family: Arial; mso-hansi-font-family: Arial; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial">其他综合收益结转留存收益</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US 
style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: "Arial",sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 宋体'>”</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-ascii-font-family: Arial; mso-hansi-font-family: Arial; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial">项目，主要反映：（</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US 
style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: "Arial",sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 宋体'>1</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-ascii-font-family: Arial; mso-hansi-font-family: Arial; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial">）企业</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-ascii-font-family: Arial; mso-hansi-font-family: Arial; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial">指定为以公允价值计量且其变动计入其他综合收益的非交易性权</SPAN><SPAN 
style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: "Arial",sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 宋体'> 
</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-ascii-font-family: Arial; mso-hansi-font-family: Arial; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial">益工具投资终止确认时，之前计入其他综合收益的累计利得或损失</SPAN><SPAN 
style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: "Arial",sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 宋体'> 
</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-ascii-font-family: Arial; mso-hansi-font-family: Arial; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial">从其他综合收益中转入留存收益的金额；（</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US 
style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: "Arial",sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 宋体'>2</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-ascii-font-family: Arial; mso-hansi-font-family: Arial; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial">）企业指定为以公允价</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-ascii-font-family: Arial; mso-hansi-font-family: Arial; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial">值计量且其变动计入当期损益的金融负债终止确认时，之前由企业</SPAN><SPAN 
style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: "Arial",sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 宋体'> 
</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-ascii-font-family: Arial; mso-hansi-font-family: Arial; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial">自身信用风险变动引起而计入其他综合收益的累计利得或损失从</SPAN><SPAN 
style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: "Arial",sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 宋体'> 
</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-ascii-font-family: Arial; mso-hansi-font-family: Arial; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial">其他综合收益中转入留存收益的金额等。该项目应根据</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US 
style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: "Arial",sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 宋体'>“</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-ascii-font-family: Arial; mso-hansi-font-family: Arial; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial">其他综合</SPAN><SPAN 
style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: "Arial",sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 宋体'> 
</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-ascii-font-family: Arial; mso-hansi-font-family: Arial; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial">收益</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US 
style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: "Arial",sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 宋体'>”</SPAN><SPAN 
style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: 宋体; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-ascii-font-family: Arial; mso-hansi-font-family: Arial; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: Arial">科目的相关明细科目的发生额分析填列。</SPAN><SPAN 
lang=EN-US 
style='FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: "Arial",sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 121%; mso-font-kerning: 0pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 宋体'><o:p></o:p></SPAN></P>
